author: jgomes
msg: Removed all Console.WriteLin() statements and replaced them with equivalent Tracer calls.
Fixed NAnt script integration with Visual Studio.
Fixed NAnt script to only build .NET 3.5 version of assembly, since that is the only supported platform.

author: srowen
msg: Allow CachingRecommender to cache rescored entries as long as the Rescorer does not change

author: omalley
msg: HADOOP-4433. Improve data loader for collecting metrics and log files.

author: tross
msg: qmfconsole.py - minor fixes, make sure object-dereference only queries one broker
Bridge.cpp    - Added channel-id to queue name to avoid collisions
qpid-route    - Added link-map feature for viewing the entire federated topology

author: mrglavas
msg: If the name of element in the document below the root element happens to be match the
name of the root element we were not passing this node to the acceptNode() method of
an LSParserFilter. This was occurring because we were doing the check based on the name
of the node instead of identity with the root element object. This is fixed now thanks
to the patch from Arthur De Magalhaes.
